Title: Posits, a New Kind of Number, Improves the Math of AI
Description: Training the large neural networks behind many modern AI tools requires real computational might: OpenAI’s most advanced language model GPT-3 required a million billion billions of operations to train, and cost about US $5 million in compute time. Some researchers now think they have a better way.

Title: 10 Reasons Startups Prefer Node.js over .NET
Description: I’ve been a .NET software developer for my entire career, and I truly love the platform. I love the C# language, the productivity of the platform, and the ecosystem. But I’ve been dealing with an existential crisis for years now. I see how companies, especially startups, don’t seem to choose .NET as their platform of choice. They go to Node.js, Ruby, Python, or even Java as an alternative to ASP.NET. I even went as far as to write an article about it: Where did the Microsoft Tech Stack disappear?
